It's an amazing sword!\""},{"lineNumber":70290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだけど、その使用には、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, to use it,"},{"lineNumber":70291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類が沢山死んでないと駄目なの」","translatedEnglishLine":"a large number of humans must have died.\""},{"lineNumber":70292,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、なんとも皮肉な話よねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, what an ironic story, isn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":70293,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへー、でもねー、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, but you know,"},{"lineNumber":70294,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私そういう神様のえっぐいとこねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I like that edgy side of the gods.\""},{"lineNumber":70295,"originalJapaneseLine":"「好き☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I like it☆\""},{"lineNumber":70296,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってなわけで！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, that's how it is!"},{"lineNumber":70297,"originalJapaneseLine":"　歴代勇者の皆々様方はこれらの条件に対し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Each of the past heroes faced these conditions,"},{"lineNumber":70298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　色々と思い、色々と選択したことでしょう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and thought deeply, making various choices!\""},{"lineNumber":70299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、今回アリオス様は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And now, Lord Alrios has chosen"},{"lineNumber":70300,"originalJapaneseLine":"　多くを救う為に少数を切り捨てる選択を","translatedEnglishLine":"to sacrifice a few in order to save many.\""},{"lineNumber":70301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、今後どうなっていくのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, what will happen from now on,"},{"lineNumber":70302,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あなたもちゃんと見ていてね」","translatedEnglishLine":"you should watch closely too.\""},{"lineNumber":70303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃー！　DXの会よー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aah! It's the DX Association!\""},{"lineNumber":70304,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うえーーん！　みんな逃げてー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah! Everyone run away!\""},{"lineNumber":70305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってなわけで、DXの会の説明をば！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, let me explain the DX vast,"},{"lineNumber":70311,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全てに手を伸ばすことは不可能でしょうけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"it's probably impossible for them to reach Book!\""},{"lineNumber":70314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お互いに公平な契約を結び、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They make fair contracts with each other,"},{"lineNumber":70315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その不履行を許さない魔法の書により、","translatedEnglishLine":"and the magical book does not allow breach of contract,"},{"lineNumber":70316,"originalJapaneseLine":"　DXの会は地位を強くしているわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"which strengthens the DX Association's book?"},{"lineNumber":70318,"originalJapaneseLine":"　というあなたにデラックスブックの説明」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let me explain the Deluxe Book to you.\""},{"lineNumber":70319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大昔、この本が作られる","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Long ago, there was a man who was the reason this book was created."},{"lineNumber":70320,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっかけとなった男性がいたの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんまりにも魔王や魔人が強すぎて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon Lords and Devils are just too strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対抗馬がちっとも出てこない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no worthy challenger at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、これ、つまんないなって神様なっちゃったの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the gods got bored because of that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで、今度は魔王の敵、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, this time, what was needed was an enemy of the Demon Lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王を倒すことが出来る存在が求められて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: someone who could defeat the Demon Lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者の誕生と相成るわけねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and thus the birth of the hero came to be."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バランスが壊れる要素あるって時に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When there's an element that breaks the balance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それの修正じゃなくて、また新たな要素で解決は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: instead of fixing it, solving it by adding a new element again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと危なくない？　プランナーちゃん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn't that a bit risky? Planner-chan?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、それはそれとして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, leaving that aside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして勇者システムは作られ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the hero system was created like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴史にチラチラと姿を見せるようになったわけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started to appear here and there in history."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この頃はまだ魔剣カオス様も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Back then, we still didn't have Lord Chaos the Demon Sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖刀日光様もなかったので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nor the holy sword Nichiko,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正真正銘、人間が魔人に対抗出来る唯一の手段ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so genuinely, this was the only way humans could stand against demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、使うのにも条件があるんだけどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there are conditions to its use though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私の左側を見れば分かるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you look to my left side, you'll understand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エスクードソードは魔人も魔王も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Escudo Sword can kill demons, demon lords,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 果ては三超神まで殺せるすごい剣！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even up to the Three Supreme Deities! It's an amazing sword!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだけど、その使用には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, to use it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類が沢山死んでないと駄目なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a large number of humans must have died."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、なんとも皮肉な話よねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, what an ironic story, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへー、でもねー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, but you know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私そういう神様のえっぐいとこねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I like that edgy side of the gods."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「好き☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I like it☆"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, that's how it is!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴代勇者の皆々様方はこれらの条件に対し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each of the past heroes faced these conditions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々と思い、色々と選択したことでしょう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and thought deeply, making various choices!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、今回アリオス様は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And now, Lord Alrios has chosen

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くを救う為に少数を切り捨てる選択を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to sacrifice a few in order to save many."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、今後どうなっていくのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, what will happen from now on,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたもちゃんと見ていてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you should watch closely too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃー！　DXの会よー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aah! It's the DX Association!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うえーーん！　みんな逃げてー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaah! Everyone run away!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで、DXの会の説明をば！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, let me explain the DX Association!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ざっくり言えば奴隷に麻薬の売買にやりたい放題、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Simply put, they do as they please with slaves and drug trafficking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暴力団やら暗殺団やらの元締めよねー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they're the bosses of gangs and assassination groups.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闇社会のドン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The don of the underworld,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏の世界の覇権を握っている組織ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an organization that holds hegemony over the shadow world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、闇の世界も広いから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, since the underworld is vast,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てに手を伸ばすことは不可能でしょうけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's probably impossible for them to reach everything,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり手広ーーくやってるみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it seems they cover quite a wide range."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その強さの源はデラックスブック！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The source of their strength is the Deluxe Book!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お互いに公平な契約を結び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They make fair contracts with each other,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その不履行を許さない魔法の書により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the magical book does not allow breach of contract,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: DXの会は地位を強くしているわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which strengthens the DX Association's status."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃあ、この書は何よ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what exactly is this book?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というあなたにデラックスブックの説明」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me explain the Deluxe Book to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大昔、この本が作られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Long ago, there was a man who was the reason this book was created.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっかけとなった男性がいたの」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対抗馬がちっとも出てこない。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴史にチラチラと姿を見せるようになったわけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started to appear here and there in history."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nor the holy sword Nichiko,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so genuinely, this was the only way humans could stand against demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、使うのにも条件があるんだけどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there are conditions to its use though..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you look to my left side, you'll understand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エスクードソードは魔人も魔王も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Escudo Sword can kill demons, demon lords,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 果ては三超神まで殺せるすごい剣！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even up to the Three Supreme Deities! It's an amazing sword!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだけど、その使用には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, to use it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類が沢山死んでないと駄目なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a large number of humans must have died."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, what an ironic story, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへー、でもねー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, but you know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私そういう神様のえっぐいとこねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I like that edgy side of the gods."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「好き☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I like it☆"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, that's how it is!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴代勇者の皆々様方はこれらの条件に対し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each of the past heroes faced these conditions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々と思い、色々と選択したことでしょう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and thought deeply, making various choices!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、今回アリオス様は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And now, Lord Alrios has chosen

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くを救う為に少数を切り捨てる選択を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to sacrifice a few in order to save many."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、今後どうなっていくのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, what will happen from now on,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたもちゃんと見ていてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you should watch closely too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃー！　DXの会よー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aah! It's the DX Association!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うえーーん！　みんな逃げてー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaah! Everyone run away!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで、DXの会の説明をば！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, let me explain the DX Association!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ざっくり言えば奴隷に麻薬の売買にやりたい放題、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Simply put, they do as they please with slaves and drug trafficking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暴力団やら暗殺団やらの元締めよねー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they're the bosses of gangs and assassination groups.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闇社会のドン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The don of the underworld,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏の世界の覇権を握っている組織ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an organization that holds hegemony over the shadow world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、闇の世界も広いから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, since the underworld is vast,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てに手を伸ばすことは不可能でしょうけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's probably impossible for them to reach everything,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり手広ーーくやってるみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it seems they cover quite a wide range."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その強さの源はデラックスブック！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The source of their strength is the Deluxe Book!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お互いに公平な契約を結び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They make fair contracts with each other,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その不履行を許さない魔法の書により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the magical book does not allow breach of contract,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: DXの会は地位を強くしているわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which strengthens the DX Association's status."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃあ、この書は何よ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what exactly is this book?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というあなたにデラックスブックの説明」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me explain the Deluxe Book to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大昔、この本が作られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Long ago, there was a man who was the reason this book was created.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっかけとなった男性がいたの」
